Dimension_Description: Quality Dimension under the Use Case Viewpoint. Describes wether the dataset can easily be understood by potential users.
Dimension under the Service and Dataset Viewpoint. Evaluates the quality of the service that provides the data.
Presence and absence of features, their attributes and their relationship [ISO 19157-1:2021].

Thematic quality is defined as the accuracy of quantitative attributes and the correctness of non-quantitative attributes and of the classifications of features and their relationships [ISO 19157-1:2021].
Degree of adherence to logical rules of data structure, attribution and relationships (data structure can be conceptual, logical or physical) [ISO 19157-1:2021].
Accuracy of the temporal attributes and temporal relationships of features [ISO 19157-1:2021].
Accuracy of the position of features [ISO 19157-1:2021].
